iati-activity.title: Clean Cities for Growth and Development
iati-activity.description: The overall goal of the project is to empower the Kanyama community to claim their rights to adequate sanitation and land rights and to hold government accountable for the fulfilment of these rights.The specific goals are:1. To empower citizens to actively engage local government structures that are responsible and accountable to citizens for the fulfilment of rights to WASH and other social services.2. To increase the number of households with access to effective and safe sanitation and solid waste management services (especially for women and girls and those in vulnerable situations).3. To ensure clean, safe and green environment for improved health, wealth and well-being of residents of Kanyama.
